thread.section_title: The Marmara Manhattan - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Best decision of our trip
thread.title_full: Best decision of our trip - Review of The Marmara Manhattan, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: CaiQS
title: Best decision of our trip
text: My husband and I stayed at the Marmara for 5 nights when visiting NYC for our first wedding anniversary. It was the best decision we could have made. We had a Subway stop right next to the building, that connected with all relevant lines. Having a kitchen and comfortable living room allowed us to save time and money on foods such as breakfast and snacks, and spend comfortably in tasty lunches and diners. Everyone treated us kindly, and the place was perfectly clean and well supplied..
